title: 'Rivers of fire': an eruption of Hawaii's Mauna Loa Volcano
creator_credit: Les Malzman, Jon Erickson, Kathleen English, United States. National Park Service and Hawaii Natural History Association
brief_description: Examines the twenty two day eruption of Mauna Loa, the world’s largest volcano which started on 25 March 1984. Explains the Hawaiian volcanoes with spectacular photography within a well structured presentation which includes excellent graphics of plate tectonics and the hot spot theory.
